separate detectors.from sentence: Instead of a " one-size - fitsall " approach , we train separate detectors tuned for different scales ( and aspect ratios ) .

scale - specific detectors.from sentence: To address both concerns , we train and run scale - specific detectors in a multitask fashion : they make use of features defined over multiple layers of single ( deep ) feature hierarchy .

To extend.from sentence: To extend features fine - tuned from these networks to objects of novel sizes , we employ a simply strategy : resize images at test - time by interpolation and decimation .

interpolating.from sentence: While many recognition systems are applied in a " multi-resolution " fashion by processing an image pyramid , we find that interpolating the lowest layer of the pyramid is particularly crucial for finding small objects .

our final approach.from sentence: Hence our final approach is a delicate mixture of scale - specific detectors that are used in a scale - invariant fashion ( by processing an image pyramid to capture large scale variations ) .

convolutional deep features.from sentence: We demonstrate that convolutional deep features extracted from multiple layers ( also known as " hypercolumn " features ) are effective " foveal " descriptors that capture both high - resolution detail and coarse low - resolution cues across large receptive field ( ) .

highresolution components.from sentence: We show that highresolution components of our foveal descriptors ( extracted from lower convolutional layers ) are crucial for such accurate localization in .
